title: AddLogPropertyReference (Method)
text:
METHOD AddLogPropertyReference : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Adds a device object property reference to the Log_DeviceObjectProperty-Property of this BACnet-Object.

rows.Name: deviceInstance
rows.Comment:
The BACnet device instance number to add a property
reference for.

rows:
The BACnet object instance number to add a property
reference for.
The BACnet object type to add a property reference for.
The BACnet property ID to add a property reference for.

The BACnet index within the reference property to add a
property reference for.
Whether the device is present or not.
